topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54320b7c6368724fb7650000#post_54320b7c6368724fb7650000
But my point is Norio Wakamoto's performance doesn't make all the other performances good.
And Steven Brand does a FANTASTIC job as Anderson.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54320c0163687247dd100000#post_54320c0163687247dd100000

It comes down to styles.

Tim Curry is always over the top and you just enjoy his perfomance and chewing the scenery, but Alan Rickman has more of a presence just by being in the room.

That's the same for both dubs for Hellsing. Wakamoto is full ham while Freeman plays it with slightly more self control.

Both are good, but Freeman gives Alucard a more commanding presence
